about_the_game:
In brick blaster you have to keep your ball bouncing. Lose your ball, you lose a life. Pickup new guns from power-up bricks and mince through the rest.
Things get tougher as you progress.

Work your way up the leader board to become the master brick blaster.

The game currently offers a single-player experience where you shoot and bounce your way through waves of blocks picking up more powerful weapons and power-up blocks.
Power-up blocks change the way the ball behaves and provides an advantage. Gun pickups increase your arsenal with which to destroy the blocks faster.

Online leader boards show how you rank vs other players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400K 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: Open XR - SteamVR and Oculus. Tested with Vive, Quest and Index. Windows Mixed Reality not supported
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection required to participate in leaderboards

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Gather your weapons and blast your way through the bricks in this new twist to the classic brick breaking genre. Test your dexterity and aim as you wreak havoc on waves of defenseless bricks.
